name: Light Crusader (1995)
description:
Light Crusader is an action role-playing game developed by Treasure and published by Sega for their Sega Genesis console in 1995. It was ported to Microsoft Windows in 2010.

It is similar in gameplay to Landstalker: The Treasures of King Nole, blending role-playing video game, action-adventure and platform video game elements in much the same way.
